titleInfo.title: Pythagorean harmony in the world of metal oxygen clusters of the {Mo-11} type: Giant wheels and spheres both based on a pentagonal type unit

mods.abstract: Polyoxometalate systems provide excellent models for the study of unusual molecular growth processes based on {Mo-11}-type building motifs/blocks leading to unusual giant spherical and ring-shaped structures with stoichiometry {Mo-11}(n), (n = 12, 14, 16)-a Pythagorean harmony.

titleInfo.title: Molecular Self-Assembly : Organic versus Inorganic Approaches
